name: A. Min Or Sum
statement:
You are given an array a of size n.You can perform the following
operation on the array: Choose two different integers i, j (1
leq i < j
leq n), replace a_i with x and a_j with y. In order not to break the
array, a_i | a_j = x | y must be held, where | denotes the bitwise OR
operation. Notice that x and y are non-negative integers. Please output
the minimum sum of the array you can get after using the operation above
any number of times.
